"Cheeky Monkey App End User License Agreement This End User License Agreement (“Agreement”) is between you and Cheeky Monkey and governs use of this app made available through the Google play Store. By installing the Cheeky Monkey App, you agree to be bound by this Agreement and understand that there is no tolerance for objectionable content. If you do not agree with the terms and conditions of this Agreement, you are not entitled to use the Cheeky Monkey App.
In order to ensure Cheeky Monkey provides the best experience possible for everyone, we strongly enforce a no tolerance policy for objectionable content. If you see inappropriate content, please use the "Report as offensive" feature found under each post.
1. Parties This Agreement is between you and Cheeky Monkey only. Not withstanding the foregoing, you acknowledge that Google and its subsidiaries are third party beneficiaries of this Agreement and Google has the right to enforce this Agreement against you. Cheeky Monkey, not Google, is solely responsible for the Cheeky Monkey App and its content.
2. Privacy Cheeky Monkey may collect and use information about your usage of the Cheeky Monkey App, including certain types of information from and about your device. Cheeky Monkey may use this information, as long as it is in a form that does not personally identify you, to measure the use and performance of the Cheeky Monkey App.
3. Limited License Cheeky Monkey grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Cheeky Monkey App for your personal, non-commercial purposes. You may only use theBARter App on Google devices that you own or control and as permitted by the App Store Terms of Service.
4. Age Restrictions By using the Cheeky Monkey App, you represent and warrant that (a) you are 25 years of age or older and you agree to be bound by this Agreement; (b) if you are under 25 years of age, you have obtained verifiable consent from a parent or legal guardian; and © your use of the Cheeky Monkey App does not violate any applicable law or regulation. Your access to the Cheeky Monkey App may be terminated without warning if Cheeky Monkey believes, in its sole discretion, that you are under the age of 25 years and have not obtained verifiable consent from a parent or legal guardian. If you are a parent or legal guardian and you provide your consent to your child's use of the Cheeky Monkey App, you agree to be bound by this Agreement in respect to your child's use of the Cheeky Monkey App.
5. Objectionable Content Policy Content may not be submitted to Cheeky Monkey, who will moderate all content and ultimately decide whether or not to post a submission to the extent such content includes, is in conjunction with, or alongside any, Objectionable Content. Objectionable Content includes, but is not limited to: (i) sexually explicit materials; (ii) obscene, defamatory, libelous, slanderous, violent and/or unlawful content or profanity; (iii) content that infringes upon the rights of any third party, including copyright, trademark, privacy, publicity or other personal or proprietary right, or that is deceptive or fraudulent; (iv) content that promotes the use or sale of illegal or regulated substances, tobacco products, ammunition and/or firearms; and (v) gambling, including without limitation, any online casino, sports books, bingo or poker.
6. Warranty Cheeky Monkey disclaims all warranties about the Cheeky Monkey App to the fullest extent permitted by law. To the extent any warranty exists under law that cannot be disclaimed, Cheeky Monkey, not Google, shall be solely responsible for such warranty.
7. Maintenance and Support Cheeky Monkey does provide minimal maintenance or support for it but not to the extent that any maintenance or support is required by applicable law, Cheeky Monkey, not Google, shall be obligated to furnish any such maintenance or support.
8. Product Claims Cheeky Monkey, not Google, is responsible for addressing any claims by you relating to the Cheeky Monkey App or use of it, including, but not limited to: (i) any product liability claim; (ii) any claim that the Cheeky Monkey App fails to conform to any applicable legal or regulatory requirement; and (iii) any claim arising under consumer protection or similar legislation. Nothing in this Agreement shall be deemed an admission that you may have such claims.
9. Third Party Intellectual Property Claims Cheeky Monkey shall not be obligated to indemnify or defend you with respect to any third party claim arising out or relating to the Cheeky Monkey App. To the extent Cheeky Monkey is required to provide indemnification by applicable law, Cheeky Monkey, not Google, shall be solely responsible for the investigation, defense, settlement and discharge of any claim that the Cheeky Monkey App or your use of it infringes any third party intellectual property right. Agree Decline"
Cheeky is a unique concept bar that works on the lines of Stock Exchange. Prices fluctuate to offer drinks based on customer’s demand. Just like stock Market where share prices fall and rise based on company’s performance, drinks too can hold high prices or can come crashing down based on customer’s ratings. Customers can order their drink through app, however through a dynamic market like environment it allows them to get best prices at a given time.
This unique Stock Bar exchange has been developed and designed by Entrada Soft, a leading software development firm based out of Noida. This Mobile Application’s USP is its design and architecture which allows it easy access to Waiting Staff & customers alike. Furthermore, App also gives access to Projector screen displays & a backend system that showcases bar menu & drink prices.\n\n Our Flagship Barter App is the one we are really proud of. This one of a kind App allows you to trade your leftover Bottle or purchased Whiskey/Beer Bottle at the Click of the mouse. It also works on Service exchange Model which means that once ordered, customer can consume leftover drink at any of the bars that are part of our App. So, once you have had too much, this app comes to your rescue.\n\n Our Team is a group of highly qualified engineers which likes to Pub hop, so to say. We strive for out of the box solutions that are not only deliverable but scalable & our young, energetic team is always up to the task for it.
What has Cheeky Monkey for Me?\n Cheeky Monkey helps you create your own price for a drink based on the collective rating of the customers who have rated the drink. Real time demand gives a chance for each drink to have its own pricing. This gives customer total control.\n\n How does it work for me?\n It works on the principle of supply and demand. Our Bar Stock Exchange software computes the latest prices through a comprehensive algorithm which instantly updates the prices on the app for the next set of customer to order their drink.\n\n This level playing field keeps both the customers & the Bar owners on their toes. Not just the owners but the customers compete with each other to rate the best drink.\n\n Do I ever pay a lower price?\n Customer truly becomes the king on this platform. Similar to Stock Market their ratings can collectively ensure that market crashes to its lowest. Once that happens they are updated on their phones as well as through a siren in the bar. In this scenario, they should be ready to order their favorite drink and get the benefit of Lower prices. Keep an Eye on the falling prices and reap rich rewards.\n\n How is Bar Exchange better than Happy Hours?\n The market opens at 6 PM everyday & customers can order their drink at the Bar or can download the App and order Online. Drinks Menus are displayed on LCDs placed strategically in all sections of the Bar.\n\n How do I get the winner feeling?\n Prices start really low at Cheeky Monkey & as the day progresses they begin to dip or pick up based on customer’s ratings. Customers can enjoy the lowest prices at a cost price of the drink. If you show up early and make reservations, you have a greater chance of grabbing your favorite vodka or Beer at amazingly low prices.
